title: AIQ Report Schema
description: JSON Schema for Universal AIQ Framework assessment reports. Validates output from all three assessment levels (L1 Self, L2 Peer, L3 Auto/Audit). Version 1.1 adds dual scoring (Personal/Corporate) and company type modifiers.

schemaVersion.description: Schema version for forwards compatibility. 1.1 adds companyType, role enum, and dual scoring.

reportType.description: Type of assessment: self-assessment (L1), peer-validation (L2), or full-verification (L3 with automated/audit evidence).

generatedAt.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the report was generated.

assessee.description: Information about the person being assessed.

name.description: Full name of the person being assessed.

role.description: Job role category that determines base dimension weights. v1.1 uses enum: General, Developer, Researcher, Support, Leader.

email.description: Email address. Empty string if not provided (enables aggregation without nulls).

companyType.description: Company culture profile that modifies role weights. Optional - if not provided, no modifier is applied.

dimensions.description: Scores for all five SCOREs dimensions: Study, Copy, Output, Research, Ethical security.

study.description: Study dimension: Information diet, conceptual fluency, trend awareness.

copy.description: Copy dimension: Evaluation skill, scientific rigor, quality judgment.

output.description: Output dimension: Deployment capability, workflow integration, reliability.

research.description: Research dimension: Innovation, novel methods, advancing the field.

ethical.description: Ethical security dimension: Safety practices, ethics, failure awareness, compliance.

calculation.description: Final score calculation details. v1.1 adds personalScore, corporateScore, and gap for dual scoring.

personalScore.description: Personal Readiness score - measures individual knowledge, skills, productivity. v1.1+

rawTotal.description: Sum of weighted dimension scores for personal readiness.

scoreBand.description: Human-readable proficiency band for personal readiness.

corporateScore.description: Corporate Impact score - measures deployed systems, business outcomes, governance. v1.1+

rawTotal.description: Sum of weighted dimension scores for corporate impact.

scoreBand.description: Human-readable proficiency band for corporate impact.

gap.description: personalScore.normalizedScore - corporateScore.normalizedScore. Positive = ready for more responsibility. v1.1+

combinedScore.description: Legacy single score for v1.0 compatibility or when scoreType=combined is used.

rawTotal.description: Sum of weighted dimension scores using combined weights.
Sum of all weighted dimension scores before evidence multiplier. For v1.0 compat.

finalScore.description: rawTotal * evidenceMultiplier. For v1.0 compat - use personalScore/corporateScore in v1.1.

normalizedScore.description: Final score normalized to 0-100 scale. For v1.0 compat.

scoreBand.description: Human-readable proficiency band. For v1.0 compat.

confidence.description: Confidence rating based on evidence quality: LOW (<0.7 avg multiplier), MEDIUM (0.7-0.9), HIGH (>0.9).

validation.description: Peer/manager validation details. Required for Level 2+ assessments.

validatorName.description: Full name of the person who validated the assessment.

validatedAt.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when validation was completed.

dimensionConfirmations.description: Per-dimension confirmation or adjustment by validator.

evidence.description: Detailed evidence collection for Level 3 auto/audit verification.

tools.description: Evidence collected from specific AI tools. Keys are tool identifiers (e.g., 'claudeCode', 'chatgpt', 'githubCopilot').

auditNotes.description: Free-form notes from auditor reviewing evidence, Git history, or other artifacts.

validation.description: Validation object is required for Level 2+ assessments.

evidence.description: Evidence object is required for Level 3 assessments.

dimensionScore.description: Score data for a single SCOREs dimension.

level.description: Proficiency level (0-5) as defined in the SCOREs rubric.

points.description: Raw points earned at this level (varies by dimension).

weight.description: Role-based weight for this dimension (0.0-1.0, all weights sum to 1.0).

weightedScore.description: points * weight. Contribution of this dimension to rawTotal.

dimensionConfirmation.description: Validator's confirmation or adjustment for a dimension score.

confirmed.description: True if validator agrees with the assessee's self-reported level.

adjustedLevel.description: If not confirmed, the validator's adjusted level (0-5). Null if confirmed.

toolEvidence.description: Evidence data from a specific AI tool. Structure varies by tool.

completed.description: Whether evidence collection for this tool was completed.

monthlyTokens.description: Monthly token usage. Empty string if not collected.

sessionsPerMonth.description: Number of sessions per month. Empty string if not collected.

min.description: Minimum daily tokens. Empty string if not collected.

max.description: Maximum daily tokens. Empty string if not collected.

avg.description: Average daily tokens. Empty string if not collected.

conversationCount.description: Total conversation count (e.g., ChatGPT). Empty string if not collected.

exportFilename.description: Filename of exported data archive. Empty string if not collected.
